name: Action Reactor
description:
TERMINAL - once pure and perfect - has been corrupted. For every millisecond, the malicious SYNDROTE seizes control of a new sector. Your mission is to REBOOT THE UNIVERSE by deploying a PULSE BOMB in the heart of the ACTION REACTOR. In your path stands a vast array of BADASS ELECTRO WARRIORS, hell-bent on your elimination.

I made this game out of love for the pace, feel and humor of 90s FPS games and the clean look of vector games and vintage CGI. It is a solo indie passion project and currently in an early stage, but I'm planning to expand the world of Action Reactor over the next months into something more and more fun and entertaining.

FEATURES
  • Pure, fast-paced and addictive 90s FPS gameplay in Room-scale VR
  • Clean vector & low-poly art style inspired by classic arcade games and vintage cgi
  • Rapid dash & slomo jump locomotion with great freedom of movement
  • Procedural platform maps and roguelike population logic for max replayability
  • Dynamic body shattering (why put holes in your enemies when you can pulverize them?)
  • Advanced active ragdoll physics with animation blending and muscle simulation
  • There's currently a very basic collection of classic FPS weapons with more planned.

THINGS TO DO
  • Obliterate hordes of badass electro warriors and corrupt security drones
  • Ambush, assault and assassinate using crazy slow motion stunts and akimbo weapon combos
  • Blast your enemies to pieces, steal their weapons and "mine" their corpses for health
  • Out of ammo? Dash-tackle your foes, knocking them to the ground while you bail out or rearm
  • Unlock forcefields and new level branches by finding secret switches, keys and items hidden in the environment
  • Adapt your play style; swift stealth and surgical strikes can sometimes be as effective as frontal assault
